meanings.definition: A game in which players hit a small rubber ball against a wall using their hands.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children played handballs against the school wall.
meanings.sent2: The handballs tournament was intense as each player tried to hit the ball faster.
meanings.sent3: In handballs, the wall always wins - it never misses a shot!
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic sound of handballs hitting the wall echoed through the gym.
meanings.sent5: The championship match of handballs was so exciting that even the teachers watched.

meanings.definition: A pass made with the hand in soccer.
meanings.sent1: The player's handballs were accurate, helping the team maintain possession.
meanings.sent2: The coach emphasized the importance of precise handballs during training.
meanings.sent3: During the game, the goalie's unexpected handballs surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: His handballs were like magic, always reaching the intended teammate.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered every time a player made a successful handballs pass.

meanings.definition: To pass or hit the ball with the hand in a game.
meanings.sent1: She handballs the ball to her teammate for a quick score.
meanings.sent2: Players are not allowed to handballs the ball in soccer.
meanings.sent3: The referee caught him trying to handballs the ball illegally.
meanings.sent4: He handballs the ball with such precision that it always reaches its target.
meanings.sent5: In the heat of the moment, he decided to handballs the ball instead of kicking it.
